General.Name: POLARIS WORKS Inc
General.Description: POLARIS WORKS, Inc. provides image sensor packaging and testing solutions in South Korea. It offers NeoPAC, an image sensor chip scale package; NeoPAC Application, an optical coating package; and camera modules. The company was formerly known as iA Networks Company Limited and changed its name to POLARIS WORKS, Inc. in March 2021. POLARIS WORKS, Inc. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Cheongju, South Korea.
